import React from "react"; import "./Profile.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { auth } from "../firebase"; import { database } from "../Database/Firebase"; import { useState } from "react"; function ProfileEdit() { const [info, setInfo] = useState([]); const[Name,getName]=useState(""); const[Age,getAge]=useState(""); const[Profess,getProfess]=useState(""); const[Phone,getPhone]=useState(""); const user = auth.currentUser; GetInfo(user.email); function GetInfo(usermail) { database .collection("User") .get() .then((querySnapshot) => { querySnapshot.forEach((element) => { var data = element.data(); if (data.email == usermail) { setInfo(data); } }); }); } function UpdateInfo(usermail) { database .collection("User") .doc(usermail) .update({ name: Name, age: Age, email: usermail, phone:Phone, profession:Profess, }) // .get() // .then((querySnapshot) => { // querySnapshot.forEach((element) => { // var data = element.data(); // if (data.email == usermail) { // setInfo(data); // } // }); // }); } return (
